name: Tiny Story 2 adventure
description:
You liked Tiny Story 1, you will love the second part of the saga. Lots of puzzles, puzzles, and quests to solve offline!

In Tiny Story 2 adventure, you have to save your imprisoned friends. Find out why they were taken to Rhino Island and why King Rhino suddenly got strange.

Choose one of the 5 heroes and start your adventure!
